sections.heading: made by Laws 2022, LB800, or Laws 2025, LB182; applicability
sections.text: (1) The changes made in sections 77-2502, 77-2503, and 77-2505 by Laws 2022, LB800, shall apply to taxable years beginning or deemed to begin on or after January 1, 2023.(2) The changes made in sections 77-2502, 77-2503, and 77-2506 by Law
